thread.title: Neil Patrick Harris Sings The Theme Song For "A Series Of Unfortunate Events"
thread.title_full: Neil Patrick Harris Sings The Theme Song For "A Series Of Unfortunate Events"

author: Krystie Lee Yandoli
title: Neil Patrick Harris Sings The Theme Song For "A Series Of Unfortunate Events"
text:
View this image ›
Netflix ID: 10315995 2. We’ve got so many questions about how everything will go down in the series. View this image ›
Netflix ID: 10316847 3. But now we have one less inquiry, as Netflix has unveiled the new, original theme song for the series. Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=fWrjbmij1UY . youtube.com ID: 10315968 4. Neil Patrick Harris sings the lyrics, “Look away, look away, look away, look away,” different scenes flash across the screen. View this image ›
Netflix / Via youtube.com ID: 10316875 5. He also narrates the plot of A Series of Unfortunate Events with lyrics like, “Three children lose their home and go to live with someone awful / He tries to steal their fortune with a plot that’s not quite lawful.” View this image ›
Netflix / Via youtube.com ID: 10316900 6. It’s creepy, which is to be expected but also pretty catchy. View this image ›
Netflix / Via youtube.com ID: 10316938 7. Is it Friday yet?! View this image ›
Netflix / Via youtube.com ID: 10316901 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
